room_title: Escape room "Table for Two" by 5th Street Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: My wife took me to the "Table for Two" escape room. We had a blast. The new owner and lady who runs the place where amazing! I recommend this place to everyone. Date night or a fun night out with friends!

room_title: Escape room "Table for Two" by 5th Street Escape Room in Pittsburgh
review: We drove all the way up from Bellaire to do the Table for Two and had a blast! It was so much fun! My sister and I loved it so much that we stayed to play the other games. The way it all came together, we just loved it! Definitely would love to come back someday!
